name: W.C. Hughes

roles_in_work.title: Magic lantern slide (Railway station and harbour, Oban, Scotland)

biography: Opticians and maker of electronic equipment, early cinema equipment and magic lanterns. Established 1867. Until 1882 based at 151 Hoxton Street. Traded at 82 Mortimer Road, near Kingsland Road, London, England (1900s). Became Ltd Company by 1910.
